body:
Comment 1: 
This is tough; the build system currently doesn't support different OS versions
explicitly, and this is something that may be necessary for FreeBSD 9 as well. If we
had something in place for supporting this, it may be something fixable, but I'm not
intimately familiar with clone(2) on Linux -- so hopefully fewer args doesn't mean
incompatible implementation.

Do you have a link to a 2.4 manpage for the syscall? (Are futexes available in 2.4?)

--dho
